content: crochet top size 36 38 material catania 100%cotton 125m/50gr 3 balls crochet hook number 2 5 needle difficulty intermediate instruction crochet two bras with pattern number i we repeat row 7 9 5times lay down both parts from left side crochet around both pieces row 7 continue with 32 chains / back part / row ends with slip chain next row with pattern i row 8 row 7-9 from pattern i repeat 3 times and continue with pattern ii 6 round row continue with row iii once 2 row with pattern ii and once more pattern iii piece ends with row 8 and 9 pattern i ending around back piece crochet with fans - *5double crochet slip 3 chain single crochet* between star repeat around on the top of bra make strap /80 chain in each chain single crochet / continue with fans around bra make second strap and fans row ends with slip chain pattern i pattern ii www e-pleteni cz pattern iii www e-pleteni cz
